class DataFrameLoader[source]

DataFrameLoader()

Represent Data Frame Loader class

Attributes: X_full: full dataframe load from raw input X_test_full: full test dataframe load from raw input X: features y: target

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# dfl = DataFrameLoader()
# dfl
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

DataFrameLoader.from_csv[source]

DataFrameLoader.from_csv(train_file_path:str, test_file_path:str, idx_col:str, target:str, test_size:float, random_state=42)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dfl = DataFrameLoader().from_csv(train_file_path="input/home_data/train.csv", test_file_path="input/home_data/train.csv", idx_col="Id", target="SalePrice", test_size=0.2)
dfl

DataFrameLoader object with X_full, X_test and X(features) dataframe and y(target) series
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
print("X_full shape:", dfl.X_full.shape)
print("X_test_full shape:", dfl.X_test_full.shape)

X_full shape: (1460, 80)
X_test_full shape: (1460, 80)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert dfl.X_full.shape == (1460,80)
assert dfl.X_test_full.shape == (1460,80)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
print("homedata X shape:", dfl.X.shape)
print("homedata y shape", dfl.y.shape)

homedata X shape: (1460, 79)
homedata y shape (1460,)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert dfl.X.shape == (1460,79)
assert dfl.y.shape == (1460,)

print("homedata y_train shape", dfl.y_train.shape)
print("homedata X_valid shape:", dfl.X_valid.shape)
print("homedata y_valid shape", dfl.y_valid.shape)

homedata X_train shape: (1168, 76)
homedata y_train shape (1168,)
homedata X_valid shape: (292, 76)
homedata y_valid shape (292,)
